casebody.data:
WATTS
v.
NCDENR. No. 191A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 21, 2007. John R. Buric, Charlotte, for Watts. Dahr Joseph Tanoury, Assistant Attorney General, for NCDENR.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of December 2007 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Watts) shall have up to and including the 6th day of February 2008 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of December 2007."
